Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus. As in preceding accountancies (in particular the series P. Lille 63 (a-b)), the recorded sums are high in lines 1, 5, 6 and 8 (thousands of drachmas). Note the characteristic of this entry, the mention of a nonlocalised bank in lines 1 and 8.
